trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost"></xref> for registering a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"></xref> The service host will have multiple endpoints registered based on the number of listeners registered in the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Gir et <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost"> </xref> for å registrere en <xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"> </xref> Tjenesteverten har flere endepunkter registrert basert på antall lyttere registrert i konfigurasjonen.

trans-unit.source: By default, the WSTrustServiceHost class provides the following: - It adds WS-Trust endpoints to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> based on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TrustEndpoints%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Som standard klassen WSTrustServiceHost omfatter følgende:-legges WS-Trust endepunkt til den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>basert på den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TrustEndpoints%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TrustEndpoints%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: - It enables metadata over the base addresses if the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.DisableWsdl%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: -Det gjør det mulig metadata over base adressene hvis den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.DisableWsdl%2A>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.DisableWsdl%2A>

trans-unit.source: - It configures the service certificate on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> service credentials if a WIF configuration section specifies a service certificate.
trans-unit.target: -Det konfigurerer service-sertifikat på den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>tjeneste legitimasjon hvis en WIF konfigurasjonsdel angir et service-sertifikat.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: Note that this will override the equivalent service certificate settings in WCF configuration.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at dette overstyrer tilsvarende sertifikatet tjenesteinnstillingene i WCF-konfigurasjonen.

trans-unit.source: - It integrates IdentityModel token handlers into the security processing pipeline by calling the ExtensibleSecurityCredentials.ConfigureServiceHost method on itself.
trans-unit.target: -Det integrerer IdentityModel token behandlingsprogrammer i sikkerhet som behandler pipelinen ved å kalle metoden ExtensibleSecurityCredentials.ConfigureServiceHost på seg selv.

trans-unit.source: The WSTrustServiceHost class may be overridden to customize this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WSTrustServiceHost kan overstyres for å tilpasse dette problemet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost"></xref> class with the specified base addresses and service (STS) configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost"> </xref> klasse med de angitte base adressene og behandle (STS) konfigurasjonsinnstillingene.

trans-unit.source: A default <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract> is created using the specified <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration> instance.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract>er opprettet ved hjelp av den angitte <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>forekomsten.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration> instance is used for one-time initialization of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>; for this reason, setting properties on the configuration instance after the host is initialized may not result in behavior changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>forekomsten brukes for engangspassord initialisering av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>; for derfor angi egenskaper i konfigurasjonsforekomst når verten er initialisert ikke kan resultere i virkemåte endringer.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> that contains the STS settings to use to initialize the service host.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"> </xref> som inneholder STS innstillingene som skal brukes til å initialisere Tjenesteverten.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Uri> that contains the base addresses for the service host.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref:System.Uri>som inneholder base-adresser for Tjenesteverten.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost"></xref> class with the specified base addresses and service contract.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost"> </xref> klassen med det angitte grunntallet adressene og servicekontrakten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract"></xref> that represents the service contract to use.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract"> </xref> som representerer servicekontrakten til bruk.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Uri> that contains the base addresses for the service host.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref:System.Uri>som inneholder base-adresser for Tjenesteverten.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: baseAddresses is .
trans-unit.target: baseAddressesis .

trans-unit.source: -or- serviceContract is .
trans-unit.target: -or- serviceContract is .

trans-unit.source: Loads the service description information from the configuration file and applies it to the runtime that is being constructed.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tjenesten beskrivelse informasjonen fra konfigurasjonsfilen og gjelder for kjøring som blir opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Configures metadata (WSDL) for the service host.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurerer metadata (WSDL) for Tjenesteverten.

trans-unit.source: This method evaluates the base addresses of the service host, and adds mex endpoints for http, https, net.tcp, and net.pipe addresses, only when no mex endpoints have been previously added by the user.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden evaluerer base adressene til Tjenesteverten og legger til metadatautveksling endepunkt for http, https, net.tcp, og net.pipe-adresser bare når ingen metadatautveksling endepunkter har blitt tidligere lagt til av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: For http and https addresses, HTTP and HTTPS, the GET mechanism for WSDL retrieval is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Hent mekanisme for henting av WSDL er aktivert for http og https adresser HTTP og HTTPS.

trans-unit.source: Override of the base class method.
trans-unit.target: Overstyring av metoden basisklasse.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceConfiguration"></xref> on the service host and then invokes the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurerer den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceConfiguration"> </xref> på Tjenesteverten og aktiverer base implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost.UpdateServiceConfiguration%2A> method and then invokes the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost.UpdateServiceConfiguration%2A>metoden og aktiverer base implementeringen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost.UpdateServiceConfiguration%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the security token service (STS) configuration for this this instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter tokentjenesten (STS) sikkerhetskonfigurasjonen for denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The STS configuration.
trans-unit.target: STS-konfigurasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets the service contract associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter servicekontrakten som er tilknyttet denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The service contract for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Servicekontrakten for denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials.IdentityConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.Credentials*> property of the service host with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration*> property.
trans-unit.target: Overstyrer den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials.IdentityConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> på den <> </> *> for Tjenesteverten med den <> </> *> egenskapen.
